features.name: Learn through free and paid courses
features.info: Nexgami academy provides beginener frienly course for learning about web3 and blockchain technologies

features.name: Earn points through quiz
features.info: After finishing each course, user can crack a quiz to earn points that will bring exciting rewards

features.name: Login using OAuth
features.info: Users having account in Nexgami.com can directly login using OAuth without creating a separate account

features.name: Upload course content in rich text editor
features.info: This website provides a rich text editor for seamless course content creation and you can paste your doc or word document keeping the format including images

features.name: A minimalistic shopping UI
features.info: Minimal UI with featured products, categories and banner that built using Material UI

features.name: Personalized Updatable Products
features.info: Create and update your own profile in the dashboard. Can be updated including profile photo, email address, passwords and social profile links

features.name: Catergorized Products
features.info: Properly categorized list of products. Also have proper pagination for full product list and fully responsive design all over

features.name: Proper Authentication With Firebase and Custom database
features.info: Authentiaction for users using a fustion of Firebase and custom databae using Mongo DB. Secured by JWT

features.name: Personalized Updatable Profile
features.info: Create and update your own profile in the dashboard. Can be updated including profile photo, email address, passwords and social profile links

features.name: Switch between light and Dark mode
features.info: Full systemwide dark mode and easy swiching enabled.

features.name: Manage course materials easily and upload on the go
features.info: See all course details with categorized semester

features.name: Manage evets
features.info: Dynamic event management system that shows in the homepage
